info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Towner County through 700 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Hansboro to near Amourdale to 7 miles south of Rolla. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. At 615 PM CDT, a 39 mph gust was reported near Rolla. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Amourdale around 630 PM CDT. Hansboro around 635 PM CDT. Perth around 640 PM CDT. Rocklake around 645 PM CDT. Arndt around 700 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
